title: Assignments API
description: Created AWS-hosted, Node.js-based REST API for Assignment Management, integrated with MySQL RDS & Distributed Databases, basic implementation of Binary Large Object Storage using S3, utilizing GitHub for CI/CD tools and Pulumi for AWS network setup

title: Health Insurance API Development
description: Developed a Health Insurance RESTful API using Node.js featuring parent-child joins, Elasticsearch-based search functionality, and secure authorization through Google Identity Provider and JWT.

title: Restaurant Management Application
description: Implemented a Java Spring Boot application utilizing DAO classes and Hibernate libraries for MySQL database communication, demonstrating expertise in MVC architecture.

title: Order Management Application
description: Application built using Java Swing GUI and MySQL for the database. Incorporated Mail verification for customers placing orders. Led the team throughout the application development process.

title: Shopping Cart Application
description: Engineered a Java Servlet-based Shopping Cart Application employing the sophisticated Spring MVC architecture, incorporating the versatile JSTL, and deployed on the Tomcat Server.

title: Travelling Salesman Problem
description: Devised a sophisticated algorithm for the TSP using OOP, incorporating the Christofides algorithm with optimization techniques like 2-opt, 3-opt, Ant Colonization, and Simulated Annealing.
